tweets.author: &TEAM OFFICIAL
tweets.text:
[#Today's andTEAM] 251212
TBS Series "Ravit!"

#Ravit 
#andTEAM #K

thread_replies.author: ☾·̩͙✶haru❤︎⍤⃝
thread_replies.text:
I had a great time laughing from the morning   
Kei-kun, you're amazing for taking off the headphones   
Thank you for the fun time  Please appear again

thread_replies.author: Vitaly Davydov
thread_replies.text:
3 onboarding moves that can grow revenue by 50%:

1) Put the main value on screen 1, not 5

2) Add social proof early to push more trials

3) Remove one extra step to save users

We kept 80+ more steps like this in one onboarding growth checklist

thread_replies.author: &maho_K
thread_replies.text:
Good work
Your costume was cute The headphone slipping off accident was fun too

thread_replies.author: chiiiii
thread_replies.text: I was cracking up from the morning, I figured you'd pull off something big but this exceeded expectations www

thread_replies.author: liccatea ʙᵃᶜᵏᵗᵒᴸⁱᶠᵉ☽٭
thread_replies.text:
K-kun, good work!  Your headphones  came off,  
but I burst out laughing so hard! As expected of K-kun

thread_replies.author: ゆうこっち
thread_replies.text:
K-kun, good work on Ravit~!  
It seems like you got teased big time again today   
I wanna go home and watch it soon!!

thread_replies.author: 구름 켕아지ᗜ• ﻌ • ᗜ
thread_replies.text: Brown hair looks pretty, Kay-nim. Please show your ears next time.

thread_replies.author: yoshien
thread_replies.text:
Kei-kun, thanks for all your hard work!  
Thanks for the laughs and healing from the morning  
I burst out laughing so hard when the headphones came off!! The best!!

thread_replies.author: 제이..
thread_replies.text:
k~ As expected, it's Friday's k! Thanks for your hard work since the morning~!
I'm glad I get to see your face because you appear on Lavit from time to time.
Thanks to you, my ear for Japanese has gotten quite used to it too (lol) I laughed a lot today too lololol

thread_replies.author: Ru
thread_replies.text:
Kei-kun  
Good work from the morning—!  
I'm glad you got teased by Kawashima-san, right?   
This is the Kei-kun I love   
I'll work hard on my job too—

tweets.author: オリコンニュース
tweets.text:
2025
Favorite Male Announcer Ranking

《Minami Nami Masatoshi》
From 2nd place last year to finally 1st

《Akogi Ayumu》
Last year, in his 21st year since joining the company, first time ranking in
Jumped up from 6th to 2nd

『Ravvit!』 Announcers Monopolize TOP2

Up

thread_replies.author: クリスティー
thread_replies.text: Congratulations ! I'm so thrilled that the two beloved hosts of my favorite Ravitto! took 1st and 2nd place!! ‼︎ I cried from the morning  I'll keep cheering for you from now on

thread_replies.author: がしゅ～いん
thread_replies.text:
Congratulations, Minami Ana and Akogi Ana!  
Back when THE TIME first started, there were comments like "TBS only has Azumi Ana and Endo Ana, so the Friday MC isn't a station announcer," but in the past few years, it's suddenly become a treasure trove of nationally recognized

thread_replies.author: 名無し
thread_replies.text:
Mako-chan was also number one, and when I think about it this way, it's partly because both of them are so appealing, but also because Ravitto's power is really strong...  
That said, it's just way too amazing...

thread_replies.author: waka
thread_replies.text:
Congrats----------------!!!!!!
I didn't make it, I just love the plain, polished announcer vibe so much!!!!!
Next up, Kumachan is waiting too----------------

thread_replies.author: Uracchi(o!o)qRICE
thread_replies.text: Is it that viewers are gradually shifting from "Morning Wide Show" to "Ravit" or something like that? Could that be part of it? And being able to catch up with catch-up streaming on TVer is probably a big factor too, right? Anyway, truly congratulations!!!! A huge leap

thread_replies.author: ニダスの飼い犬  BESTY
thread_replies.text:
I'm on the verge of tears but not crying   
Please keep singing B'z songs!  
I love them a lot too!

thread_replies.author: 松沼春和
thread_replies.text: Even though the ratings aren't going up, it really made me realize once again just how amazing Ravit’s attention level is, right?

thread_replies.author: oremarori低浮上
thread_replies.text:
おめでとうございます
ラヴィットすごいね
来年はクマスもランクインして
3人で歌おう(*´∀`).•*¨*•.¸♬

thread_replies.author: 春畑貴世
thread_replies.text: 難波ちゃん、赤荻アナ１位２位おめでとうございます。難波ちゃんドッキリで稲葉さんがいたら、どんな反応するのか見たいです。

thread_replies.author: チームにょろにょろ
thread_replies.text:
おめでとうございます
見てました〜

安住アナはどこ行った？あ、殿堂入りか！と。そういえば去年も調べたわ笑

Back when THE TIME first started, there were comments like "TBS only has Azumi Ana and Endo Ana, so the Friday MC isn't a station announcer," but in the past few years, it's suddenly become a treasure trove of nationally recognized

thread_replies.author: 名無し
thread_replies.text:
Mako-chan was also number one, and when I think about it this way, it's partly because both of them are so appealing, but also because Ravitto's power is really strong...  
That said, it's just way too amazing...

thread_replies.author: waka
thread_replies.text:
Congrats----------------!!!!!!
I didn't make it, I just love the plain, polished announcer vibe so much!!!!!
Next up, Kumachan is waiting too----------------

thread_replies.author: Uracchi(o!o)qRICE
thread_replies.text: Is it that viewers are gradually shifting from "Morning Wide Show" to "Ravit" or something like that? Could that be part of it? And being able to catch up with catch-up streaming on TVer is probably a big factor too, right? Anyway, truly congratulations!!!! A huge leap

thread_replies.author: ニダスの飼い犬  BESTY
thread_replies.text:
I'm on the verge of tears but not crying   
Please keep singing B'z songs!  
I love them a lot too!

thread_replies.author: 松沼春和
thread_replies.text: Even though the ratings aren't going up, it really made me realize once again just how amazing Ravit’s attention level is, right?

thread_replies.author: oremarori低浮上
thread_replies.text:
おめでとうございます
ラヴィットすごいね
来年はクマスもランクインして
3人で歌おう(*´∀`).•*¨*•.¸♬

thread_replies.author: 春畑貴世
thread_replies.text: 難波ちゃん、赤荻アナ１位２位おめでとうございます。難波ちゃんドッキリで稲葉さんがいたら、どんな反応するのか見たいです。

thread_replies.author: チームにょろにょろ
thread_replies.text:
おめでとうございます
見てました〜

安住アナはどこ行った？あ、殿堂入りか！と。そういえば去年も調べたわ笑

tweets.author: クリスティー
tweets.text: Congratulations ! I'm so thrilled that the two beloved hosts of my favorite Ravitto! took 1st and 2nd place!! ‼︎ I cried from the morning  I'll keep cheering for you from now on

tweets.author: Kdice
tweets.text: I get why Nanami Ana is #1, but who’s everyone’s fave?  This year’s ranking is surprisingly hot

tweets.author: ぷりん
tweets.text:
南波さん、赤荻さん、マコちゃん
皆様おめでとうございます。
発表見て泣いたぁ
これからも応援します

tweets.author: Chumba Casino
tweets.text: Reward yourself with some fun!  Hundreds of free games await at Chumba Casino!

tweets.author: masuo
tweets.text:
I love both Minami-san and Akaogi-san♡  
Congratulations on 1st and 2nd place  
I'll keep supporting Ravitto from now on‼︎  
The best show ever
